subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: The defending champion Rafael Nadal beat Gilles Muller in straight sets Saturday to reach the fourth round while Maria Sharapova and Caroline Wozniacki won in straights set.
snippet: The defending champion Rafael Nadal beat Gilles Muller in straight sets Saturday to reach the fourth round while Maria Sharapova and Caroline Wozniacki won in straights set.
